alert.note: Alert for Caddo (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 2:26PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Caddo Parish through 300 PM CDT... At 225 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Blanchard, or 13 miles northwest of Shreveport, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blanchard, Oil City, Mooringsport, Belcher, Gilliam, Dixie, Caddo Lake and Cavett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
